source.description: Orthologues and Paralogues between D. melanogaster, C. elegans, D. pseudoobscura, A. gambiae and A. mellifera. Also orthologues from these five organisms to C. familiaris, D. discoideum, D. rerio, G. gallus, H. sapiens, M. musculus, P. troglodytes, R. norvegicus, S. cerevisiae, S. pombe from InParanoid

source.name: Protein interactions - D. melanogaster, C. elegans, S. cerevisiae protein-protein interactions
source.description: All protein-protein interaction data from IntAct . See Protein Interactions aspect to retrieve full list of publcations
